name: Discuss a current topic with your partner. The examiner will ask you to share your opinions on subjects like technology, travel, or daily habits. You will describe experiences and justify your views with examples.
questionContents: What role does technology play in daily life? How has it changed the way people communicate?
Describe a memorable travel experience. What made it special for you?
Talk about a habit you think is beneficial. How does it improve your life?
Do you think people should spend more time outdoors? Why or why not?
If you could learn a new skill instantly, what would it be and why?
